mil7.3.10:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.3.10:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.3.10:1.1_0: “After going to the five factors you should be carried out? What are the five factors they to be produced?”
mil7.3.10:1.2_0: “Great king, a corpse does not have a corpse with a charnel ground.
mil7.3.10:1.3_0: In the same way, a wise person who has the view of greed, hate, and delusion, and is contemptuous, jealous, stinginess, deceit, devious, deceitful, and sneaky.
mil7.3.10:1.4_0: This is the first kind of ocean.
mil7.3.10:11.3_0: I was embidered with streams of peacocks,
mil7.3.10:2.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean is freed from the great rivers, made of removing the crystal, cloth, thread, and rubbish heaps, and consists of many kinds of precious things.
mil7.3.10:2.2_0: In the same way, a village in the wilderness, a fruit of the path, people of stream-entry is fruitful and beneficial, taking the fruit of stream-entry to the fruit of once-return, non-return, and perfection.
mil7.3.10:2.3_0: This is the second opportunity to cross.
mil7.3.10:3.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean is a great man with abundant wealth.
mil7.3.10:3.2_0: In the same way, a cow with few wishes, content, secluded, along, and praiseworthy. ...
mil7.3.10:3.3_0: This is the third drain that affects.
mil7.3.10:4.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean is consistent and born of a river overflows, plastered inside and out, drains, with latches fastened and windows shuttered from the sky in the sky.
mil7.3.10:4.2_0: In the same way, a village with possessions, honor, and popularity, you should deliberately lie, because of honesty.’
mil7.3.10:4.3_0: This is the fourth part of the ocean.
mil7.3.10:5.1_0: ‘Consider the ocean is consistent and doesn’t overflow its boundaries.
mil7.3.10:5.2_0: In the same way, when a training rule is laid down for my disciples they wouldn’t break it even for the sake of their own life.’
mil7.3.10:6.1_0: Furthermore, the ocean is consistent and doesn’t overflow its boundaries of the Ganges, Yamunā, Aciravatī, Sarabhū, and Mahī—none overflows.
mil7.3.10:6.2_0: In the same way, there are lay people who enter the village with the answer, questioning for the recitation of the Monastic Law, and the Teacher’s instruction, who takes a group of ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, and fifty.
mil7.3.10:6.3_0: This is the fifth part of the ocean.
mil7.3.10:6.4_0: When the Buddha has spoken, gods,
mil7.3.10:7.2_0: There’s no river Aciravatī the river,
mil7.3.10:9.1_0: The second sub-chapter on the ocean is finished.
